Language.name: en
Language.Text:
No one has been here in a while.
We must be in some really old part ...
We going?
But watch out, everything here is falling.

Round objects cannot stand on one another to form columns. Instead, they crumble into piles.
Try how characters interact with stones. For example, Picard (Armadillo) is resistant and an impact by stone won't harm him.
